caption.p: Scatter plots showing correlation between: ( a) Commercial IBL respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) IgG ELISA and plaque reduction neutralisation test (PRNT) RSV antibody titres ( b) Crude RSV lysate IgG ELISA antibody and PRNT RSV antibody titres. The spearman correlation coefficient (r) is shown. ELISA IgG antibodies are presented using base10 log scale, while PRNT RSV antibodies are presented using base 2 log scale.
